title: 1 Acre Land For Lease Near Kalpitiya Kite Lagoon
details:
Property Ref : MK

★★★★★ 1 Acre Land For Lease At Toursitc Area Kalpitiya ★★★★★

This is a 1 acre property at Sethawadiya on the road leading to the Kalpitiya kite lagoon and 5 minutes from the Kudawa beach. There are already a couple of well established kite schools such as Sri Lanka Kite and De Silva Kite functional adjacent to the land as well as many resorts, private villas, restaurants and guest houses that are in operation.

The plot for sale is at Sethawadiya Kalpitiya which is at the heart of touristic development zone and is the central area for tourism in Kalpitiya. The area provides world class conditions for kite surfing.

The deed is Sinnakkara (free hold) and there is no disputes with external entities. This land suitable for nature resorts, kite school, personal holiday bungalow or any other tourism related projects.

Now available for short term/long term lease with -

- Clear deed and title ( Sinnakkara - free hold )
- Water
- Electricity
- Good road access

Expected lease LKR 100,000/month

If interested please contact us on 0094 77 77 33 823 for further details

Thanks for looking :)
